message.login.validation: Please enter a username or account.
message.login.failure: Login failed. Please check your ID or password.
message.workspace.create.success: The workspace has been created. We are currently testing for a normal service and it will take about 10 to 15 minutes.
message.incorrect.access.login.please: Invalid token value. Please log in again.
message.login.wrong: Login failed. Please check your ID and password.
message.workspace.vm.add.success: [{count}] desktop virtual machine creation requests completed.
message.workspace.user.add.ok: You have added [{count}] users to the workspace.
message.delete.confirm: Are you sure you want to delete it?
message.workspace.user.delete.ok: You have deleted [{count}] users from your workspace.
message.workspace.user.delete.fail: Failed to delete [{count}] users from workspace.
message.name.dupl: Duplicates an existing name. Please enter a different name.
message.workspace.delete.existvm: There are workspaces with virtual machines. The selected [{count}] workspaces were not deleted.
message.login.wrong.400: Failed to communicate with the controller server. Please contact the administrator.
message.login.wrong.401: Failed to generate settlement tokens when logging in. Please contact the administrator.
message.vm.status.start.ok: [{count}] desktop virtual machines completed request to start.
message.vm.status.start.fail: [{count}] desktop virtual machines failed start requests.
message.vm.status.restart.ok: [{count}] desktop virtual machines have completed restart requests.
message.vm.status.restart.fail: [{count}] desktop virtual machines failed restart requests.
message.vm.status.stop.ok: The request to stop [{count}] desktop virtual machines has been completed.
message.vm.status.stop.fail: [{count}] desktop virtual machines failed request to stop.
message.vm.status.delete.ok: Your request to delete [{count}] desktop virtual machines has been completed.
message.vm.status.delete.fail: [{count}] desktop virtual machines failed deletion request.
message.user.vm.allocated.fail: Failed to assign users to [{count}] desktops.
message.user.vm.unlock.ok: Users unassigned to [{count}] desktop virtual machines.
message.user.vm.unlock.fail: Failed to deallocate users to [{count}] desktop virtual machines.
message.user.password.changing: You are changing the password for your user account.
message.user.password.change.fail: Password change failed. (Check the current password or contact the administrator.)
message.configuration.data.update.succes: The new configuration requires a restart of the Works API container.
message.status.check.moldapi: Check Server: Check Works API > Check Mold API
message.status.check.dc: Check Server: Check Works API > Check Mold API > Check Controller Server
message.status.check.ad: Check Server: Check Works API > Check Mold API > Check Controller Server > Check Directory Server
message.status.check.desc.all.ok: Desktop service configuration is complete. Please log in to Works Portal.
message.status.check.desc.dc.fail: The controller server is not responding.
message.status.check.desc.ad.fail: The directory server is not responding.
message.workspace.test: We are currently creating a Test VM and checking whether normal communication with the controller server and directory server is in progress. The test is performed for about 10 to 15 minutes, and the final check is normal. Test VM will be deleted automatically. Please wait.
message.account.file.upload.confirm: After uploading the file, please check that all items are entered correctly.
message.account.file.upload.description: If the data does not appear in the table below, the file format or data was not entered correctly, so please rewrite and upload.
message.userdesktop.rdp.connect.os.limit: RDP access is limited in the operating system you are currently using.
message.userdesktop.rdp.connect.client.n: The Works client for dedicated client connection is not currently installed. The required installer will be downloaded.
message.userdesktop.client.install.notic: 2. Go to the unzipped folder, run the Cert.exe file with administrator privileges, and extract it.
3. After that, install the Ablecloud works client.msix file.
4. After the two programs are installed normally, proceed with dedicated client connection.
message.file.upload.permission.denied: Current user does not have permission to upload file.
message.file.download.permission.denied: The current user does not have permission to download files.
message.userdesktop.status.text.connecti: Waiting for response to connect to desktop...
message.userdesktop.status.text.disconne: You have been disconnected from your desktop.
You have been disconnected from your desktop.
message.userdesktop.status.text.unstable: The network connection to the server is unreliable.
message.userdesktop.status.text.tunneler: An error occurred during WebSocket Tunneling.
message.workspace.policy.data.update.suc: [{name}] : Policy settings have been successfully changed.
message.userdesktop.rdp.notready: Dedicated client connection is not ready. Connect after checking the virtual machine status and connection ready status.
message.userdesktop.policy.rdp.access.de: You do not have dedicated client access rights. Please check with your administrator.
message.userdesktop.webclient.notready: Desktop connection is not ready. Please connect after checking the virtual machine status and connection readiness status.
tooltip.input.mode.false: No input method is being used. Keyboard input is accepted from an attached physical keyboard.
tooltip.input.mode.true: Required for devices such as mobile phones that accept text input and do not have a keyboard based on the entered text.
tooltip.mouse.mode.false: Tap to click. The click occurs at the touch location.
tooltip.mouse.mode.true: Drag to move the mouse pointer and tap to click. The click occurs at the mouse pointer position.
tooltip.fullscreen.mode.on: Sets the client screen to fullscreen.
tooltip.fullscreen.mode.off: Cancels the client screen to fullscreen.
tooltip.filesystem.mode.download: Provides a Modal screen for transferring file downloads.
tooltip.filesystem.mode.upload: Provides a Modal screen for sending file uploads.
placeholder.workspace.name: Enter workspace name
placeholder.workspace.compute.offering: Choose the compute offering to use in the workspace
placeholder.workspace.disk.offering: Choose a disk offering to use in the workspace
placeholder.workspace.quantity: Choose quantity to create virtual desktops
placeholder.workspace.public.boolean: Choose whether the virtual desktop is public
placeholder.workspace.template: Choose a template to use in the workspace
placeholder.workspace.dedicate: Choose whether the workspace is dedicated/shared
placeholder.user.title: Enter user title
label.name: Name
label.title: User Title
label.policy.desc.enable.menu.animations: Whether start menu opening and closing animations are allowed
label.policy.desc.enable.desktop.composi: whether graphic effects such as transparent windows and shadows are allowed
label.policy.desc.enable.full.window.dra: Whether to show the contents of a window when moving it
label.policy.desc.enable.theming: Whether to use themes for window panes and controls
label.policy.desc.console.audio: whether audio is enabled in the console session of the RDP server
label.policy.desc.create.drive.path: If the directory applied by the 'drive_path' policy does not already exist, whether to automatically create it
label.policy.desc.drive.name: The filesystem name used when passed to the RDP session
label.policy.desc.drive.path: Directory on the Guacamole server where transferred files should be stored
label.policy.desc.disable.upload: Whether to allow uploads from clients to remote server locations
label.policy.desc.disable.download: Enable remote server to client downloads
label.policy.desc.enable.drive: Whether the client is allowed to transfer files to and from the virtual drive on the Guacamole server
label.policy.desc.printer.name: Value for the name of the redirected printer device passed over the RDP session
label.policy.desc.enable.printing: Whether the client uses a PDF printer
label.policy.desc.resize.method: How to update RDP server when display size changes
label.policy.desc.height: Height of the display in pixels
label.policy.desc.width: width of the display in pixels
label.policy.desc.color.depth: Value in bits per pixel to request
label.policy.desc.initial.program: Full path to the program to run on the Client
label.policy.desc.console: Is the RDP server connected to a console session?
label.policy.desc.password_expiration_da: Set password expiration date (if 0, there is no expiration date limit)
label.policy.desc.settings.use: Whether to allow use of the Windows settings menu
label.policy.desc.windows.auto.update: Whether to allow automatic windows updates
label.policy.desc.network.file.share: Whether to allow network file sharing
label.policy.desc.windows.installer: Whether to allow user programs to be installed
input.workspace.name: Enter the name of the workspace. (The first letter is required in English/Korean, excluding special characters/less than 7 characters)
input.workspace.description: Enter a description of your workspace (32 characters or less)
input.user.account: Enter your user account. (English/numeric only, 32 characters or less)
input.user.firstname: Enter your user name (name). (Korean/English/numeric only, 32 characters or less)
input.user.lastname: Enter your user name (last name). (Korean/English/numeric only, 32 characters or less)
input.user.password: Enter the user password (7 or more characters including English, numeric and special characters)
input.user.current.password: Enter the user's existing password (at least 7 characters including English letters, numbers, and special characters)
input.user.new.password: Enter a new password for the user. (7 or more characters including English letters, numbers, and special characters)
input.user.new.passwordCheck: Does not match user new password.
input.user.email: Please enter your user email in the correct format.
input.user.title: Enter the user title (32 characters or less)
input.user.department: Enter the user department (32 characters or less)
input.user.phone: Please format your phone number (including numbers and '-').
input.file.upload.dragdrop: Click to select a file or drag and drop it to this area to upload.
search.name: Search Name.
